properties.title: B.R.U.T. - BloomReach Unit Testing for Delivery Tier

subsection.name: Bloomreach Forge Maven Repository Configuration
subsection.p: Make sure you have the Maven2 Forge repository reference in the root pom.xml of your project.

subsection.name: Version Requirements
subsection.p: Make sure the dependencies are installed as test scoped
Recommended: Use BRUT 5.1.0+ with JUnit 5 for annotation-based testing support (@BrxmPageModelTest, @BrxmJaxrsTest)

ul.li: BRUT 5.1.0+ - Annotation-based testing API, ConfigServiceRepository, 66-74% less boilerplate
BRUT 5.0.x - Multi-test support, thread-safe initialization, JUnit 4 and 5 support
JUnit 5 - Required for annotation-based testing (JUnit 4 still supported for legacy abstract classes)

subsection.name: JUnit 5 Dependency (Required for Annotation-Based Testing)
subsection.p: Note: Most brXM projects already include JUnit 5. Check your parent POM or dependency management section.
